title: New: Onra – Change of Heart
body:
In anticipation of his Japanese tour, (the Parisian beat-maker is huge over there), **[Onra](http://www.facebook.com/pages/Onra/40681565677)** has announced a 7′ full of new cuts. **_Change of Heart_** is one of the tracks included. The track itself is an 80’s disco inspired treat. Flamboyant yet brooding, the synths reverberate and pulsate around the sultry and empowered central hook.

Sep. 16 – Akita @ Jam House (DJ gig)  
Sep. 18 – Niigata @ Give Me Chocolate (DJ gig)  
Sep. 22 – Nagoya @ Mago (live)  
Sep. 23 – Osaka @ Avenue A (live)  
Sep. 30 – Tokyo @ Unit (live & DJ gig)  
Oct. 14 – Fukuoka @ Base (DJ gig)

Stream and download the track below.

The track itself is an 80’s disco inspired treat. Flamboyant yet brooding, the synths reverberate and pulsate around the sultry and empowered central hook. \[…\]
